author: rekovic
body:
PR 10_3_X

EtSum type algorithms designed for HeavyIon 2018 data taking.
 *  kTowerCount,
 * kCentrality,
 *  kAsymEt,
 *  kAsymHt,
 *  kAsymEtHF,
 *  kAsymHtHF
are implemented in CaloLayer2 subsystem of the L1 trigger.  

Changes are made in the CaloLayer 
 - Unpacker, 
 - Packer, 
 - Emulator, 
 - O2O online producer

This PR does not depend on the updated UTM library, and can be merged independently.

However, this PR is needed merged for a PR on GlobalTrigger which is coming, and which in turn
does depend on the new UTM library (v 0.7.1) https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4338.
title: Pr103x HeavyIon  2018 CaloLayer2, Un/Packer, Emulator,  O2O
